knimeNode.name: Modify Time
knimeNode.shortDescription: Modifies time information of a date&time cell.

fullDescription.intro:
Modifies date&time columns by
appending a time to local date columns (output type is local date time column),
changing the time in local or zoned date&time columns, or
removing the time from local or zoned date&time columns (output type is local date).
This node is not used to add ("plus") or subtract ("minus") time. Use the Date&Time Shift node for that.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the included columns will be modified.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new columns.

tab.name: Time Selection
tab.option: Appends a time to local date columns. Optionally a time zone can be appended too.
Changes the time of local or zoned date&time columns. The time zone will not be changed. The Modify Time Zone node can be used to change it.
Removes the time from local or zoned date&time columns. Time zones will be removed too.
If checked, a fixed time zone will be added.
If Add time zone is checked, the user can choose the time zone here.
